title: Irene Cara, '80s pop star behind 'Fame' and 'Flashdance' theme songs, dies at 63
description: Academy Award winner Irene Cara, best known for singing the theme songs for "Fame" and "Flashdance," has died in her Florida home, according to a statement from her publicist made on behalf of the singer's family. She was 63.
